attributes.action: Euromaidan: support for Ukrain to join the EU as an associate member
attributes.additional_details: Hundreds of thousands of people have been peacefully protesting in the streets for days now against the corrupt pro-Communism Ukrainian President Victor Yanukovich who refused to sign an agreement for Ukraine to join EU as an associate member. Please help us demand the resignation of the President (who gave orders to use violence against peaceful protesters, including students), elections for the new democratic government and freedom for the political prisoner Ms Yulia Timoshenko.
